articles.title: Milestones in Europe: First results in using new tools to tackle respiratory syncytial virus - EurekAlert
articles.description: Preventing one of the main causes for hospitalisation for infants worldwide might finally be in reach: in their editorial in Eurosurveillance, Eeva Broberg and Hanna Nohynek look at advances in available tools to prevent respiratory syncytial viru…

articles.author: KELVIN CHAN
articles.title: Europe reaches a deal on the world's first comprehensive AI rules - The Associated Press
articles.description: European Union negotiators have clinched a deal on the world’s first comprehensive artificial intelligence rules. The announcement paves the way for legal oversight of emerging technology used in popular services like ChatGPT that's promised to transform ever…
articles.content: LONDON (AP) European Union negotiators clinched a deal Friday on the worlds first comprehensive artificial intelligence rules, paving the way for legal oversight of AI technology that has promised to… [+6005 chars]
